text: Nicolau dos Reis Lobato (24 May 1946 â€“ 31 December 1978) was an East-Timorese politician and national hero. Lobato was the 1st Prime Minister of East Timor from 28 November to 7 December 1975. On 31 December 1978, Lobato was ambushed by Indonesian special forces and was killed after being shot in the stomach.East Timor's latest attempt to find the body of its first prime minister Nicolau dos Reis Lobato ABC News, 21 February 2018.
